--DECLARE @SiteID INT --SET @SiteID = 4
SELECT CU.*, COU.ChatOnlineUserLastChecking AS LastChecking, COU.ChatOnlineUserIsHidden AS IsHidden, CASE WHEN ChatOnlineUserJoinTime >= ISNULL(ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) AND ChatOnlineUserJoinTime >= ISNULL(ChatUserLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatOnlineUserJoinTime WHEN ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime >= ISNULL(ChatUserLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime ELSE ChatUserLastModification END AS LastChange FROM Chat_OnlineUser AS COU LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CU ON COU.ChatOnlineUserChatUserID = CU.ChatUserID WHERE COU.ChatOnlineUserSiteID = @SiteID AND COU.ChatOnlineUserJoinTime IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LastChange
